episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_01:
Why, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What a
pleasure to see you here!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_02:
We recently made some new improvements to our
minecart battle facility!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_03:
Many strong opponents are waiting along the
tracks.
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_04:
We’ve gathered some formidable teams that won’t
be easy to defeat!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_05:
And of course, Ingo and I are also new and
improved!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_06:
We hope to show you our renewed resolve as
Subway Bosses!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4001_1001_07:
If it interests you, by all means, please take on
this challenge!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_02:
I was aware that you were a force to be
reckoned with, [Name:PlayerNickname ], but to
be perfectly honest...
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_03: I didn’t think you’d make it through!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_04: We had such confidence in our renewed challenge!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_05:
Yes! In these sygna suits, we were battling truly
seriously. I can’t believe we lost!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_06:
I’ll always remember that battle—and how it
made me feel excited!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_07: However, there is no terminal called End in life!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_08:
We will continue to move forward and aim for
even greater heights!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_09:
Next time, [Name:PlayerNickname ], we’ll have
an incredible team waiting—one that won’t lose
to you!
episode_event_ch0108_ch0109/4002_1001_10:
And when we do...we hope you’re our first
passenger!
